item.title: NCLH
item.description: score:-68 Chances: Oceania Cruises has appointed two Master Chefs of France as its executive culinary directors, demonstrating a focus on culinary excellence and unique experiences for travelers. Goldman Sachs sees positive prospects for cruise stocks, indicating potential improvements in pricing and sustainable changes in industry practices.
